channel.title: Few Generic Questions
channel.description:
*using a 317 server, non delta**I don't have clickingMost.java!**I don't have actionButtons.java!*
How do I get it so that when buying from a shop, the maximum I can buy is 50, and not just 10?
How do I get it so that when I trade a npc with a shop, It shows the items? At the moment, I can only buy items from him when I 'talk' to him.
How do I set it so that 'follow' works when right clicking on other players?
How do I get it so that when using a command such as ::home, it does the animation for teleport, brings me to the coordinates, than finishes the animation for teleport? At the momment, If I do ::home, this teleports my player to the coordinates, then does the animation, but only the beginning, and when my player shrinks to a tiny person. It freezes.
How do I get it so let's say a 'tree' object, will never be cut down, and you can continue to cut from it forever without worrying about switching trees?
Finally, how do I make it so that a stationary NPC like a banker, can face in any direction that I want. At the moment, they all face south.
Thanks guys.

item.title: Few Generic Questions
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

[quote=“DarienM, post:2, topic:353279”]i dont know ALL those, cause im new, but i can anwser the second one

How do I get it so that when buying from a shop, the maximum I can buy is 50, and not just 10?

open up your source folder and search for shops.cfg
look for name of shop, and the item i.d should be first, followed up by the amount the npc sells of it[/quote]

I understand that, like I set it so there is a 100 of one item, what i’m wondering is how when you walk into the shop you can buy like 50 runs for your self, instead of buying 10 at a time.

Read full topic

item.title: Few Generic Questions
item.dc:creator: @DarienM DarienM
item.description:
@DarienM wrote:

i dont know ALL those, cause im new, but i can anwser the second one

How do I get it so that when buying from a shop, the maximum I can buy is 50, and not just 10?

open up your source folder and search for shops.cfg
look for name of shop, and the item i.d should be first, followed up by the amount the npc sells of it

*using a 317 server, non delta**I don’t have clickingMost.java!*I don’t have actionButtons.java!

How do I get it so that when buying from a shop, the maximum I can buy is 50, and not just 10?

How do I get it so that when I trade a npc with a shop, It shows the items? At the moment, I can only buy items from him when I ‘talk’ to him.

How do I set it so that ‘follow’ works when right clicking on other players?

How do I get it so let’s say a ‘tree’ object, will never be cut down, and you can continue to cut from it forever without worrying about switching trees?

Finally, how do I make it so that a stationary NPC like a banker, can face in any direction that I want. At the moment, they all face south.

Thanks guys.
